item.title: Pratik Yapay Zeka
item.description: Pratik Yapay Zeka(Practical Artificial Intelligence) is a project created for everyone who wants to improve themselves in artificial intelligence technologies, who wants to share their knowledge and experience with others, who enjoys adding value, producing and sharing.
